report.name: Processor Status Warnings
report.data: SELECT Processor_Name, Mgr_Status, Task_Status, Last_Status_Hours, Status_Date, Most_Recent_Job_Info, Most_Recent_Log_Message, Most_Recent_Error_Message, Task_Detail_Status FROM ( SELECT Processor_Name, Mgr_Status, Task_Status, Last_Status_Hours, Status_Date, Most_Recent_Job_Info, Most_Recent_Log_Message, Most_Recent_Error_Message, Task_Detail_Status, row_number() OVER ( ORDER BY Processor_name ) AS RowNum FROM V_Processor_Status_Warnings ) LookupQ WHERE RowNum <= 500 ORDER BY RowNum

report.name: Job Steps Stale and Failed
report.data: SELECT Warning_Message, Job, Tool, RunTime_Minutes, Job_Progress, RunTime_Predicted_Hours, State_Name, Last_CPU_Status_Hours, Processor, Start, Step, Dataset, Settings_File, Parameter_File, Completion_Message, Evaluation_Message FROM ( SELECT Warning_Message, Job, Tool, RunTime_Minutes, Job_Progress, RunTime_Predicted_Hours, State_Name, Last_CPU_Status_Hours, Processor, Start, Step, Dataset, Settings_File, Parameter_File, Completion_Message, Evaluation_Message, row_number() OVER ( ORDER BY State_Name, Job ) AS RowNum FROM V_Job_Steps_Stale_and_Failed ) LookupQ WHERE RowNum <= 500 ORDER BY RowNum

report.name: Datasets Stale and Failed
report.data: SELECT Warning_Message, Dataset, Dataset_ID, Dataset_Created, Instrument, State, State_Date, Script, Tool, RunTime_Minutes, Step_State, Processor, Start, Step, Storage_Path FROM ( SELECT Warning_Message, Dataset, Dataset_ID, Dataset_Created, Instrument, State, State_Date, Script, Tool, RunTime_Minutes, Step_State, Processor, Start, Step, Storage_Path, row_number() OVER ( ORDER BY State, Dataset) AS RowNum FROM V_Datasets_Stale_and_Failed ) LookupQ WHERE RowNum <= 500 ORDER BY RowNum

report.name: Predefined Job Creation Errors
report.data: SELECT Item, Dataset, State, Result_Code, Message, Jobs_Created, Entered, Last_Affected FROM ( SELECT Item, Dataset, State, Result_Code, Message, Jobs_Created, Entered, Last_Affected, row_number() OVER ( ORDER BY Item) AS RowNum FROM V_Predefined_Job_Creation_Errors ) LookupQ WHERE RowNum <= 500 ORDER BY RowNum;

report.name: DMS Production DB Errors
report.data: SELECT DB, Entry_ID, Posted_By, Entered, Type, Message, Entered_By FROM ( SELECT DB, Entry_ID, Posted_By, Entered, Type, Message, Entered_By, row_number() OVER ( ORDER BY DB, Entry_ID) AS RowNum FROM V_Log_Errors_Production_DBs ) LookupQ WHERE RowNum <= 500 ORDER BY RowNum;

report.name: Disabled Indices on CBDMS
report.data: SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'DMS5' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM DMS5.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 UNION SELECT 'DMS_Capture' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM DMS_Capture.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 UNION SELECT 'DMS_Pipeline' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM DMS_Pipeline.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 UNION SELECT 'DMS_Data_Package' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM DMS_Data_Package.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 UNION SELECT 'Ontology_Lookup' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM Ontology_Lookup.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 ) LookupQ WHERE Disabled_Indices > 0
